recipesJson.name: Cotton candy Ice cream sandwich.
recipesJson.author: Misskittiii
recipesJson.description: Sweet, fluffy with a nice cookie flavor. Let steep for a week at least

reviews.text: Tastes great for about 5ml. Good lord it's a coil killer with all that EM. Especially in conjunction with sugar cookie. Probably just like Mech Sauce.
5 Stars for being a boss! Congrats on the publicity lol.
